attributes.action: Ensure that Waste Collection does not incur an additional charge as planned..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The fact that the current waste collection is part of the Council Tax must remain so.  The plans to commence charging for waste collection is beyond sensible consideration and will turn the United Kingdom into a "3rd World Country".  In addition the plan to start charging for the use of Local amenity tips, is what would keep everyone exceedingly unhappy. It would also lead to a massive increase in "Fly-Tipping"

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
